message: Let's start fair! I propose we split it 60/40.  We can always adjust later if needed.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. It reflects the slight advantage I have due to the faster inflation rate on your side. Let's make this quick and get the money!
Let's be reasonable.  We both lose money with each round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to ensure we both get something.  What do you say?
